original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe

original: Tena kho pana samayena mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantā addasaṁsu chagalakaṁ ajikāya vippaṭipajjantaṁ.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena mettiya bhūmajakāḥ bhikkhū gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantā addasasu chagalakam ajikāya vippaṭipajjanta

original: “handa mayaṁ, āvuso, imaṁ chagalakaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ nāma karoma.
analyzed: handa mayaḥ āvuso imam chagalakam dabbam malla puttam nāma karoma

original: Imaṁ ajikaṁ mettiyaṁ nāma bhikkhuniṁ karoma.
analyzed: imam ajikam mettiyam nāma bhikkhunim karoma

original: Pubbe mayaṁ, āvuso, dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ sutena avocumhā.
analyzed: pubbe mayaḥ āvuso dabbam malla puttam sutena avocumhā

original: Idāni pana amhehi sāmaṁ diṭṭho mettiyāya bhikkhuniyā vippaṭipajjanto”ti.
analyzed: idāni pana amhehi sāmam diṭṭhaḥ mettiyāya bhikkhuniyā vippaṭipajjanto ti

original: Te taṁ chagalakaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ nāma akaṁsu.
analyzed: te tam chagalakam dabbam malla puttam nāma akasu

original: Taṁ ajikaṁ mettiyaṁ nāma bhikkhuniṁ akaṁsu.
analyzed: tam ajikam mettiyam nāma bhikkhunim akasu

original: “pubbe mayaṁ, āvuso, dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ sutena avocumhā.
analyzed: pubbe mayaḥ āvuso dabbam malla puttam sutena avocumhā

original: Idāni pana amhehi sāmaṁ diṭṭho mettiyāya bhikkhuniyā vippaṭipajjanto”ti.
analyzed: idāni pana amhehi sāmam diṭṭhaḥ mettiyāya bhikkhuniyā vippaṭipajjanto ti
na ayasmā dabbaḥ malla putto evam karissati iti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesu

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ paṭipucchi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe bhikkhu saṅgham sannipātāpetvā āyasmantam dabbam malla puttam paṭipucchi

original: “sarasi tvaṁ, dabba, evarūpaṁ kattā yathayime bhikkhū āhaṁsū”ti?
analyzed: sarasi tva dabba evarūpam kattā yathā ime bhikkhū
yathā ma bhante bhagavā jānāti iti

original: tatiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: tatiyam pi khalu bhagavān āyasmantam dabbam malla puttam etat avoca

original: “sarasi tvaṁ, dabba, evarūpaṁ kattā yathayime bhikkhū āhaṁsū”ti?
analyzed: sarasi tva dabba evarūpam kattā yathā ime bhikkhū
yathā ma bhante bhagavā jānāti iti
na kho dabba dabbāḥ evam nibbeṭhenti
sace tayā katam katanti vada ehi

original: “Yato ahaṁ, bhante, jāto nābhijānāmi supinantenapi methunadhammaṁ paṭisevitā, pageva jāgaro”ti.
analyzed: yatas aha bhante jātaḥ na abhijānāmi supin antena api methuna dhammam paṭisevitā pagā iva jāgaroti

original: Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi—“tena hi, bhikkhave, ime bhikkhū anuyuñjathā”ti.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi tena hi bhikkhave ime bhikkhū anuyuñjatha ati

original: Idaṁ vatvā bhagavā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ pāvisi.
analyzed: idam vatvā bhagavā uṭṭhāya āsanā vihāram pāvisi

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū anuyuñjiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū anuyuñjisu

original: Te bhikkhūhi anuyuñjīyamānā bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ—
analyzed: te bhikkhūhi anuyuñjīyamānāḥ bhikkhūnam etam attham ārocesu

original: “kiṁ pana tumhe, āvuso, āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṁ lesamattaṁ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsethā”ti?
analyzed: kim pana tumhe āvuso āyasmantam dabbam malla puttam aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desam lesa mattam upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhasetha ati

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṁ lesamattaṁ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsessantī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma mettiya bhūmajakāḥ bhikkhū āyasmantam dabbam malla puttam aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desam lesa mattam upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhasessanti iti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etam attham ārocesuṃ pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṁ lesamattaṁ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsethā”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe bhikkhave dabbam malla puttam aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desam lesa mattam upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhasetha ati

original: “kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṁ lesamattaṁ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsessatha.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tumhe mogha purisāḥ dabbam malla puttam aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desam lesa mattam upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhasessatha
neta moghapurisāḥ appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṁ duṭṭho doso appatīto aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhum duṭṭhaḥ dosaḥ appatītaḥ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci

original: desaṁ lesamattaṁ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁseyya— ‘appeva nāma naṁ imamhā
analyzed: desam lesa mattam upādāya pārājikena dhammena an uddhaseyya appā iva nāma nam imamhā

original: Tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamāno vā asamanuggāhīyamāno vā aññabhāgiyañceva taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ hoti koci deso lesamatto upādinno, bhikkhu ca dosaṁ patiṭṭhāti, saṅghādiseso”ti.
analyzed: tatas aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamānaḥ vā a samanuggāhīyamānaḥ vā aññabhāgiyam ca iva tam adhikaraṇam hoti koci desaḥ lesa mattaḥ upādinnaḥ bhikkhu ca dosam patiṭṭhāti saṅgha ādiseso ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti

original: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṁ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṅghādisesassa.
analyzed: evam pi āpattañña bhāgiyam hoti leso ca upādinnaḥ āpatti vācāya vācāya saṅgha ādisesassa
tathā saññī codeti vā codāpeti vā
